👏Comment “Prompts” for the ChatGPT Instagram Growth Guide and this prompt

The ChatGPT Prompt:

“I’d like you to act as an expert copywriter for my business. 

I’d like to come up with ideas for the name of my next [topic] training. 

The training is about [insert what the training is about]

I’d like the title to include strong action words, use simple language and include the following ideas:
• [Audience benefit 1]
• [Audience benefit 2]
• [Problem you’re solving]

The name should make my audience feel compelled to want to watch it with a title that sells. Please generate 30 name ideas.”

❤️If this was helpful, follow @misscarolineflett to grow on Instagram
